posts.message:
شايفين الوظيفه دي؟
دي وظيفة فى Blizzard, لو متعرفش مين Blizzard أقفل الكمبيوتر حالاً :)

أكتر حاده لفتت نظري فى متطلباتها مكانتش حاجه ليها علاقه بالشغل, بل باللعب :)

Cover Letter which should include:
- Why you are interested in working at Blizzard
- What games you are currently playing

يعني لو قولتلهم بلعب  II StarCraft أعدي هوا :)
posts.caption: careers.stackoverflow.com
posts.description: Blizzard Entertainment's service technologies team is currently looking for an experienced software engineer to join our corporate applications engineering…
